channel.title: Anniversary on Wesley Hales
channel.description: Recent content in Anniversary on Wesley Hales

item.title: 1 year of blogging
item.description:
Today marks my 1 year anniversary of blogging. I started this blog to basically express my views and opinions, to give back to the open source community of whom so much has been taken, and for job credibility.

Trying to write good articles is a lot of work. Sure anybody can write about a few buzzwords and get some hits, but an article with substance and that actually helps someone through a use case or problem is where the satisfaction comes from.

I started using Google analytics on this blog around the first of October, and here are my stats since then:

  • 4,835 Visits
  • 2,493 Absolute Unique Visitors
  • 7,112 Pageviews
  • 1.47 Average Pageviews
  • 00:01:39 Time on Site
  • 79.23% Bounce Rate
  • 47.22% New Visits
Not too bad for a 2 month time span, but what really matters is getting comments that ask questions or suggestions that add to the article's value.
